title: 1128 40 "The Nightmare Strikes - Godhead of Science & Defense, St. Saturn"Transliteration: "Akumu Shūrai - Kagaku Bōei Bushin Satān-sei" (Japanese:悪夢襲来 科学防衛武神サターン聖) Nozomu Shishido Shinzō Fujita Shin Kashiwaguma May 4, 2025(2025-05-04) 3.2%[43]
transformers_text: 1128 40 The Nightmare Strikes Godhead of Science Defense St Saturn Transliteration Aku mu Sh rai Ka gaku B ei Bush in S at n sei Japanese No zo mu Shish ido Shin z Fujita Shin Kashiwa gum a May 4 2025 2025 05 04 3 2 43 The Pacifist as attack the Marines as Dr Vega punk's group moves toward the Fabi rio phase Sanji finds Bonne y who's under assault by Vice Admiral Pom sky Bonne y uses her NDE technique to knock out the Marines but is cornered by Vice Admiral Bluegrass Sanji rescues Bonne y and they return to the Vega tank 08 Meanwhile Luffy s battle with Ki zar u intensifies St Saturn arrives on Egghead halting the Pacifist as and warning the Marines He transforms into a demonic spider hybrid and kills a Marine who looks at him As Sanji s group tries to retreat Ki zar u destroys their escape route causing them to fall Luffy hits Ki zar u with a Gum Gum Star Gun before returning to normal due to Fifth Gear's exhaustion The Vega tank 08 crashes but the crew survives Saturn confronts Vega punk and Bonne y overcome with rage and grief stabs Saturn
